stimulusHtml: The Supreme Courtâ€™s decision in Shaw v. Reno (1993) is most applicable to which of the following scenarios?
choicesHtml: A public school expels students for protesting school policy.
A state establishes a ban on carrying firearms near schools and churches.
A state legislature approves a redistricting plan that draws district lines on basis of race.
A group of state officials refuse to comply with federal legislation.
